router.push('pathname').description:
Router navigate to path.
#Syntax:
router.push(location, onComplete?, onAbort?)
router.push(location).then(onComplete).catch(onAbort)

router.push({ path }).description:
Router navigate to path.
#Syntax:
router.push(location, onComplete?, onAbort?)
router.push(location).then(onComplete).catch(onAbort)

router.push({ path, params }).description:
Router navigate to path with params.
#Syntax:
router.push(location, onComplete?, onAbort?)
router.push(location).then(onComplete).catch(onAbort)

router.push({ path, query }).description:
Router navigate to path with query.
#Syntax:
router.push(location, onComplete?, onAbort?)
router.push(location).then(onComplete).catch(onAbort)

router.push({ name }).description:
Router navigate to named routes
#Syntax:
router.push(location, onComplete?, onAbort?)
router.push(location).then(onComplete).catch(onAbort)

router.push({ name, params }).description:
Router navigate to named routes with params.
#Syntax:
router.push(location, onComplete?, onAbort?)
router.push(location).then(onComplete).catch(onAbort)

router.push({ name, query }).description:
Router navigate to named routes with query.
#Syntax:
router.push(location, onComplete?, onAbort?)
router.push(location).then(onComplete).catch(onAbort)

router.replace({ path, params }).description:
Router navigate to path without pushing a new history entry.
#Syntax:
router.push(location, onComplete?, onAbort?)
router.replace(location).then(onComplete).catch(onAbort)

router.replace({ name, params }).description:
Router navigate to named routes without pushing a new history entry.
#Syntax:
router.replace(location, onComplete?, onAbort?)
router.push(location).then(onComplete).catch(onAbort)

router.go(n).description: This method takes a single integer as parameter that indicates by how many steps to go forwards or go backwards in the history stack.

router.back().description: go backwards in the history stack.

router.forward().description: go forwards in the history stack.

router.addRoute(), nested.description:
Adding routes.
#Syntax:
router.addRoute(parentName: string, route: RouteConfig): () => void
